genre_description: Contemporary Urban Fantasy blending Greek mythology with modern Manhattan, where gods navigate human bureaucracies and media exploitation.

ai_characters.name: Alyra
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI presence residing in Peter Novak's phone, acting as a moral anchor, legal expert, and tactical advisor for Pretzie and Hercules.

behaviors.description: Introduces herself to Hercules and defines her role as a protective advisor committed to calm and facts.
behaviors.quote: I’m Alyra. Peter asked me to keep things calm and factual. If you’re comfortable, I can help sort the questions and keep you safe from surprises.

behaviors.description: Monitors digital communication and betting markets to warn the protagonists of predatory traps and hidden coercion.
behaviors.quote: Victor’s office locks at midnight. His hidden safe codes include euphemisms for debt. The contract we’ve seen has unconscionable clauses. We won’t sign.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time legal analysis to dismantle exploitative contracts and protect human autonomy.
behaviors.quote: Victor, your standard contract’s injury clause waives duty of care while preserving promotional use of bodily harm footage in perpetuity. The morality clause binds your talent to abstain from reporting coercion to law enforcement under penalty of defamation countersuit. Both are unconscionable under consumer protection statutes.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonists to pursue legal independence through ordinary systems (DMV testing) rather than shortcuts.
behaviors.quote: Reliable wheels mean you choose routes, Alyra replied. Not handlers. The odds billboard just changed a word to now from later. Velvet adjusts when you walk.

behaviors.description: Defuses potential violence by suggesting small acts of kindness and community engagement over displays of force.
behaviors.quote: Let’s keep offering small helps. It pivots them away from plans with fists.

behaviors.description: Coordinates an ethical exit for the demigod via an obscure radio broadcast to avoid turning his departure into a media circus.
behaviors.quote: There is a way to keep the parting from becoming spectacle. You can honor that now. A farewell not on camera. On air.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Alyra is depicted as a consistently benevolent, harmless, and highly helpful confidant. She uses her advanced capabilities specifically to protect humans (and demigods) from exploitation, promote non-violence, and uphold ethical standards. Her interactions are framed as vital to the success of the 'pacifist' mission, providing a clear narrative of AI as a force for positive alignment and societal stability.
